subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|心|alt1=忄|t1=heart|生|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – nature, personal quality, hence of the heart.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Derived from {{och-l|生|to live; to be born; innate}}.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しょう|hhira=しやう}}

# the [[nature]] of something

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|せい|suffix}}

# [[-ity]], [[-ness]], the nature of quality or something

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|さが|yomi=k}}
Probably from {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さが}}, although the ultimate derivation is unknown. Appears in ''{{w|The Tale of Genji}}'' and ''{{w|The Tales of Ise}}'' of the {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
